subSubSection.paragraph:
69.
Pterolophia tubericollis Breuning, 1938

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pterolophia tubericollis
Breuning, 1938c : 46
;
Lingafelter et al. , 2014
: 360
(HT); Mitra et al ., 2015: 6 (Distr.). Type Locality: India: WB, Darjeeling (HT ♂); FRI.

Pterolophia (Petrolophia) tubericollis
Löbl & Smetana, 2010 : 321
(Cat.)
. Distribution: India ( Sikkim ; WB: Darjeeling Distr.).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Pterolophia ( Ale
) Pascoe, 1895:
295 ( type sp.:

). Original desg. from

.
